mapper.select: SELECT RN ,REC_EMAIL_NO ,SEN_EMAIL_NO ,RECP ,REFER ,READ_DT ,EMAIL_STAT ,CUST_NO FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX(INBOX inbox_rec_email_no_pk) */ ROWNUM RN, INBOX.* FROM INBOX WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{page} * 5) AND RECP = #{empId}) ) a WHERE a.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 5
mapper.insert: CALL insert_email( #{sender, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cntn, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recp, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refer, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNo, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM EMAIL WHERE email_stat = '3B2b'

SELECT s.sender ,s.title ,s.sent_dt FROM email s JOIN inbox i ON s.sen_email_no = i.sen_email_no WHERE s.email_stat = '3B2b' AND i.email_stat = '3B2b' AND s.cust_no = #{custNo} AND i.cust_no = #{custNo}
SELECT e.emp_name, d.dept_name, j.job_title FROM emp e JOIN dept d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN jobs j ON e.job_no = j.job_no WHERE cust_no = #{custNo}
